description: For technical performance in climbing or skiing, the Element is able to hold its own as a standalone protective outer-layer or serve as a thermoregulating mid-layer that provides ultimate warmth. Featuring Green Theme Technology’s Empel Breathable Water Protection, the Element is water-resistant while the woven face and brushed back provides for cold weather pursuits. The adjustable hood is sized to go over a climbing helmet. Two harness-compatible hand pockets store topos and bars.
name: Black Diamond Element Hoody - Mens
